summary: The mod fixes night colors of Climates Of Tamriel 3.1 Night 7
descriptionHtml:
[SIZE=7][COLOR=#FFFFFF][B]Climates Of Tamriel 3.1 Night 7 fix[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]


[COLOR=#FFC000][SIZE=5][B]Description[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]

The mod fixes night colors of [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802/] Climates Of Tamriel 3.1[/URL]  Night 7

[URL= www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3487703] Dreogan [/URL] has perfectly explained the issue with CoT Night 7. 
“Yeah, night 7 was broken. Or at least looked bad enough that I have to assume it was. Not only was the gulf between 6 and 7 inexplicably vast, but even close-to-the-camera bright objects like torches and fires in 7 were rather muted and didn\'t propagate correctly, dropping off into blackness so quickly as to render them effectively useless. 7 essentially looked like 6 viewed through extremely dark sunglasses, which does not accurately capture the behavior of light in a dark environment and is not the quality of effect I\'d grown accustomed to with CoT.

--Dreogan”



[COLOR=#FFC000][SIZE=5][B]Creadits[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]

All credits go to [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1402285/] jjc71 [/URL] for his great mod [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802/] Climates Of Tamriel [/URL]
author: Varakz
